name: Idle Solar System Colonization (Zhang Space Freight)
name_original: Idle Solar System Colonization (Zhang Space Freight)
description:
Ever wanted to be like Elon Musk for a day?

Well, now you can! Here's how...

Idle Solar System Colonization

It's an old clicker game I created back in 2018 which was subsequently deleted from Itch.io and re-uploaded twice (once recently, in addition to this time). You click some buttons, wait a while, click some more, and keep on keeping on until you have colonized the entire Terran solar system (that means the one we're living in)!

You can make believe you're Elon Musk without even leaving your chair! (You don't have to make believe if you actually are Elon Musk. In that case, it's been an honor, sir.)

Thank you for playing this game!

It was a pleasure making it for you guys again. I re-created & re-uploaded it because I know that you kids, for some reason (maybe because humanity's going back to the moon, and onwards to mars, moving forward), really enjoy playing with space clickers.

Future Projects
  • a P2P PvP moon-based battle royale game (the 'duel' game)
  • a shooter game that takes place on a space freighter (the 'main' game)
  • a web series that you can watch on YouTube (not a game)
  • an audio podcast (you can listen to it here)

Thank you for your time!
